bibl.title: Civic Finance in the Byzantine Period: The Laws and Egypte
bibl.note: Civic finance in the Novels of Justinian. - Expenditure of taxes of Antaeopolis and Aphrodito. - The role of the "houses" in civic administration: the views of Gascou. - Duties of certain "houses" for the Empire in 6th century Egypt. - "Houses" in the administration of the city. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: LIEBESCHUETZ J.H.W.G., Civic Finance in the Byzantine Period: The Laws and Egypt.

Civic finance in the Novels of Justinian. - Expenditure of taxes of Antaeopolis and Aphrodito. - The role of the "houses" in civic administration: the views of Gascou. - Duties of certain "houses" for the Empire in 6th century Egypt. - "Houses" in the administration of the city. - Conclusion.
